1370: Sifridus moved to Die lange straet2.A.0 after marriage.
Got married to Aleydis at age 28 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Aleydis, Aleydis, at age 28.
1371: Had a son with Aleydis, Woubbrecht, at age 29.
1372: Had a daughter with Aleydis, Segherarden, at age 30.
1373: Had a son with Aleydis, Eustacius, at age 31.
1376: Had a daughter with Aleydis, Diewiven, at age 34.
1377: Had a daughter with Aleydis, Ryccie, at age 35.
1378: Had a daughter with Aleydis, Aleberna, at age 36.
Lost daughter Segherarden when Segherarden was 7 years old.
1381: Had a daughter with Aleydis, Hersewindis, at age 39.
1385: Lost his wife Aleydis while she was giving birth to Auesoete in 1385.
